ValidationRule.description: Validation rule to give the salesreps an error when trying to save client setup sheets instead of John
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Client_Setup_Sheet_Completed__c = TRUE , OR(ISPICKVAL(Product__c,'Pipeline Outbound'), ISPICKVAL(Product__c,'Pipeline Management')), OR( ISNULL(Amount), ISNULL(Metro_Area__c), ISNULL(CloseDate ), ISNULL(Contract_Execution_Date__c), ISBLANK(Appointment_Qualifiers_in_Proposal__c), ISBLANK(Abstrakt_Services_Included__c ), AND( ISBLANK(Minimum_Number_of_Appts__c ), CONTAINS(TEXT(Contract_Type__c), 'Appt Guarantee')), ISBLANK(Pricebook2.Name)), AND( RecordTypeId = "012G0000000qERi"), NOT(ISPICKVAL( StageName ,'Won')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Must complete all of the fields before completing client setup sheet
